thread.title: General Manager - Mesquite - Sports Equipment

title: General Manager - Mesquite - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: The General Manager will be responsible to direct and oversee all aspects of Club Operations including its activities and relationships between guests, associates and the community. The ultimate responsibility for maximum customer satisfaction and financial performance will be this individualÂ’s primary focus.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
